TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Papulu, title = Papulu, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Papulu} }

S.FORM: Papulu Itiniay i Taitung Cen no Taitung ko Papulu a niyaro', 401 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 1,081 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 26% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 280 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 74% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 801 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 21%, Puyuma 3%, roma 2%. Ira ko kofa i niyaro'.

Papolo Itiniay i Taitong Cen no Taitong ko Papolo a niyaro', 401 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 1,081 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 26% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 280 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 74% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 801 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 21%, Poyoma 3%, roma 2%. Ira ko kofa i niyaro'.
